title: By the King a proclamation concerning tobacco.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers  to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
notes: Last complete line of sheet 4 ends "diligent".
Forbidding importation except from Bermuda and Virginia; requiring inspection and sealing of all tobacco.
"Giuen at Our Honour of Hampton Court,the nine and twentieth day of September, in the two and twentieth yeere of Our Reigne of England, France, and Ireland, and of Scotland the eight and fiftieth."
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
